name: Passenger Peril
description:
You are the pilot of the only plane to europe and everyone is trying to board it.

there are to many passengers on the plane. ITS GONNA CRASH!!
to keep this plane in the air....
try kicking the passengers out of the plane or whatever.

Controls: 

punch = z

kick = x

duck = c

player 2 (only with controller)

punch = B button

kick = X button

duck = A button
